scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:cy && npm run build:tests
scripts.test:all: npm run test:cov && npm run cy:run:cov
scripts.all: npm run pre && npm run cov:check && npm run cov
scripts.pre: rm -rf ./node_modules/.cache lib reports coverage-nyc .nyc_output && npm run lint && npm run build:all && npm run test:all && npm run cov:merge
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && cp package-publish.json ./lib/package.json && cp README-pack.md ./lib/README.md
scripts.prepublish: npm run pre && npm run build
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublish && cd lib && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i patch) && npm version $ver && npm publish && git tag $ver && git push --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublish && cd lib && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i minor) && npm version $ver && npm publish && git tag $ver && git push --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublish && cd lib && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i major) && npm version $ver && npm publish && git tag $ver && git push --tags
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo 'USE script "npm run publish:patch" (or minor/major)
' && false
